__e: Pardon me, sir, but that's exactly what I'm doing.
Forgive me, Lord. I'm not even a woman. Today was such a difficult day.
I beg your pardon, sir, but this is clear as day.
I'm sorry. Am I supposed to know who you are?
I'd like your forgiveness. I don't expect it.
I couldn't expect forgiveness. But i wanted you to have her.
Excuse me... when you marry a person. you also marry the family.
I'm sorry if I couldn't spend every waking second with you, but I had a life before you, you know.
Well, excuse me. Why didn't you tell me your sister used to be a man?
Nevertheless, you must - forgive me for interrupting.
Oh... yeah, sorry I stuck you with her.
I am sorry if I was difficult, master.
I'm sorry for making such a difficult request.
Pardon me for asking, sir, but what does that have to do with me?
If he thinks he doesn't have to apologize for anything!
I'm sorry to do this at work, I just wanted to make sure you were okay.
He went over, like you said, and a- and apologized.
I don't need your forgiveness and I don't need anybody else's.
You grant him pardon and tell me I ought to be killed.
I don't know what you're talking about.
If you think I've been sitting around, waiting for an apology all this time, I don't know what to tell you.
But forgiveness isn't about right and wrong.
I don't know what came over me.
Excuse me, I don't know what you mean.
I'm sorry, I just don't understand what you're talking about.
Assume that's why you're over here.
Excuse me, I don't know what you mean.
I don't want your forgiveness, I'm just... I'm really sorry.
